# isGreaterOrEqual() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/numbers](./esdmr.assert.numbers.md) &gt; [isGreaterOrEqual](./esdmr.assert.numbers.isgreaterorequal.md)


Asserts that the given value is greater than or equal to the given minimum value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isGreaterOrEqual(value: number, minimum: number, detail?: string, ...args: unknown[]): void;
```
